name: Hearing
text: An applicant or recipient, deeming oneself aggrieved, shall be entitled to appeal to the director in the manner prescribed by department rules and shall be afforded reasonable notice and opportunity for a hearing at which all of the evidence presented by the parties, to the extent allowed by chapter 91, shall be considered in a fair and impartial manner. [L 1941, c 296, §1(8); RL 1945, §4808; RL 1955, §107-8; HRS ; am L 1970, c 105, §5; gen ch 1985; am L 1987, c 339, §4; am L 2004, c 207, §1]
